Package uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.fullscreen

Interface FullScreenStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdaptiveFullScreenStrategy, ExclusiveModeFullScreenStrategy, LibVlcNativeFullScreenStrategy, OsxFullScreenStrategy, UnsupportedFullScreenStrategy, Win32FullScreenStrategy, XFullScreenStrategy
    public interface FullScreenStrategy
    Specification for a full-screen strategy implementation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void enterFullScreenMode()
      Attempt to enter full-screen mode.
      void exitFullScreenMode()
      Exit full-screen mode.
      boolean isFullScreenMode()
      Test whether or not full-screen mode is currently active.

    • Method Detail

      • enterFullScreenMode

        void enterFullScreenMode()
        Attempt to enter full-screen mode.

      • exitFullScreenMode

        void exitFullScreenMode()
        Exit full-screen mode.

      • isFullScreenMode

        boolean isFullScreenMode()
        Test whether or not full-screen mode is currently active.
        Returns:
        true if full-screen mode is active; otherwise false
